testCase.name: Add to casework system #process It should add the complaintData to request

failure.message: TypeError: Cannot read property 'complaintData' of undefined

testCase.failure: TypeError: Cannot read property 'complaintData' of undefined at Context.it (test/unit/behaviours/add-to-casework.spec.js:66:28) at process.topLevelDomainCallback (domain.js:121:23)

testCase.name: Complaint Should have property complaintAttributes which is an object
Complaint complaintAttributes Should have creationDate set
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails applicant Should return applicant details without phone number if not included
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails applicant Should return applicant details with phone number if included
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails agent it should return agent and applicant details with agentType RELATIVE
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails agent it should return agent and applicant details with agentType LEGAL_REP
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails agent it should return agent and applicant details with agentType SPONSOR
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails agent it should return agent and applicant details with agentType SUPPORT_ORG
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails agent Should return agent details with phone number if included
Complaint complaintAttributes reporterDetails agent should throw error if incorrect who-representing type specified
Complaint complaintAttributes reference Does not include a reference if reference-number is not present
Complaint complaintAttributes reference Does not include a reference if reference-numbers is specified as "none"
Complaint complaintAttributes reference If "gwf" reference, reference number will be set on GWF_REF
Complaint complaintAttributes reference If "ho" reference, reference number will be set on HO_REF
Complaint complaintAttributes reference If "ihs" reference, reference number will be set on IHS_REF
Complaint complaintAttributes reference If "uan" reference, reference number will be set on UAN_REF
Complaint complaintAttributes reference should throw error if incorrect ref type specified
Complaint complaintAttributes complaintDetails applicationLocation If no location provided, applicationLocation is not set
Complaint complaintAttributes complaintDetails applicationLocation If applied from "inside-uk", applicationLocation set to INSIDE_UK
Complaint complaintAttributes complaintDetails applicationLocation If applied from "outside-uk", applicationLocation set to OUTSIDE_UK
Complaint complaintAttributes complaintDetails applicationLocation It throws an error if invalid "where-applied-from"
utils #validateAgainstSchema returns true if the complaintData object fits the schema
utils #validateAgainstSchema throws an error if the complaintData object does not fit the schema
utils #sendToQueue calls create on the sqs producer with SQS parameters
utils #sendToQueue calls send on sqs producer with a unique id and stringifyed complaint data
utils #sendToQueue rejects an error if send fails
